str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
(a) of persons: powerful, able, (b) of things: possible. From dunamai; powerful or capable; neuter possible.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
